text: Flowers of Marantochloa purpurea Marantochloa is a genus of plant in family Marantaceae described as a genus in 1860.Tropico, Marantochloa Brongn. ex Gris Gris, Jean Antoine Arthur. 1860. Bulletin de la Société Botanique de France 7: 320-321 in French and Latin It is native to tropical Africa and to islands in the Indian Ocean. ; Species ==References== Category:Zingiberales genera Category:Flora of Africa Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Marantochloa
